data.name: Gossamer Matrix
data.detailed_description:
WARNING: Flashing images/lights



Gossamer Matrix is an FPS with a re-invented control scheme inspired by arcade on-rails shooting, where you have to control every aspect of your weapons and other equipment by hand. There are no hotkeys for reloading; everything is done with a simple click and drag in the right spot. Even buying a candy bar from the break room requires you to use your virtual hands instead of your real ones.

As a grunt for the company's psychoanalytics department, you find yourself thrust out of your low-speed day-to-day activities to deal with an executive who seems disposed to going rogue. Your boss said the likeliness of being sent on a mission like this was less than 1%, but here you are. Try not to fumble with your equipment too much in the heat of it all while you're out there; you don't want to get yourself killed by a loose magazine or an empty chamber.
